title: WTB or WTTF:  Walter Johnson Portrait - Old Mill Back

posts.post_title: WTB or WTTF:  Walter Johnson Portrait - Old Mill Back
posts.post_content:
I am almost done with my Wajo back run - I only need the Old Mill.   Does anyone have this card and would be willing to part with it?  I do have an SGC 40 Sov350 for trade bait or I would also be interested in buying it.  Please let me know what you have - 

thx 

Tony
That Sov350 is so killer.  Good luck Tony!

posts.post_title: if want to sell the W.Johns soverign

posts.post_content: My back run has been awfully lonely:(

Bump

Please, please, someone, help me!

Great run you have going Tony!  I sure wish I had an OM WJ to assist you with.  Some of those OM backs on certain subjects are an absolute killer to find.  I've been looking for a Chesbro Port Old Mill for about 4 years now without any luck.  Hope you find your WJ!
